Quotes.Quote: The place to improve the world is first in one's own heart and head and hands.
Quotes.Author: Robert M. Pirsig

Quotes.Quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
Quotes.Author: Albert Schweitzer

Quotes.Quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that there was within me an invincible summer.
Quotes.Author: Albert Camus

Quotes.Quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
Quotes.Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quotes.Quote: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. And today? Today is a gift. That is why we call it the present.
Quotes.Author: Babatunde Olatunji
